attributes.title: Horrid
attributes.review: I am horrified on a daily basis at the nightmare that you, sir have forced us to live these past four years. I am ashamed that we couldn’t get rid of you earlier. Rot in hell. You should probably get some help. And mike pence is the devil.

attributes.title: anyone know how to get blood out of woven nylon?!
attributes.review:
upon downloading this app a high pitch whirring noise began omitting from my phones speakers. then suddenly my 17 children stood up altogether and began fighting each other viciously. i couldn’t get them to stop and eventually i was forced to unleash the dogs on them. now i have an $800,000 medical bill for the dogs (the children cracked open the gun safe) and my carpet is filthy. 
0/7 would not recommend

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app needs to be deleted. when i first opened it a ugly fat RACIST orange cheeto came up🤢🤢🤢. this app gave my phone soooooo many viruses i can barley use some apps. I HATE THIS APP. needs to be deleted there is so much hate against poc and the lgbtq community that is encourage. DELETE THIS APP NOW.

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: Absolutely disgusting i bought a ticket and when i arived they said that my ticket was FAKE. I showed them the ticket and than they proceeded to kick me out and call me a “wanker“ 1 out of 10 would not recomend

attributes.title: It’s totally just bad
attributes.review: I can’t say much other than it’s a horrible app. The worst one I’ve come across in all my years of life. 0/10 wouldn't recommend...ever. So disappointed I must say. 😖

attributes.title: disappointing
attributes.review: when i opened the app i automatically was diagnosed with PTSD. i have never seen a man so scary and disgusting. i mean.. i’ve never met him but i’ve heard that he thinks women should EXPECT to be raped 🤢🤢🤢 how embarrassing as our president right?

attributes.title: Just no...never again
attributes.review: The first thing u see and a Cheetos/ Orange mf on there and when I tell you I almost dropped my phone when I saw him but my screen did crack more so yeah. Thanks a lot u so called “president”. Racist.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I got this app so I can keep track of trump but I forgot I got it and I went for a walk and left my phone (silly me) and came back a weeks later and missed his rally, it didn’t remind me. Very bad app

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: At first it asked for my location. I asked myself why, and I’m sure it’s because THIS APP STALKS YOU. Later on, the app was showing NAKED PICS of trump!! This app is rediculous, BAN IT I don’t want anyone else getting stalked or being shown naked pictures of him👁👄👁.  AND THATS ON PERIOD💅.

attributes.title: Sister no
attributes.review: Right when I opened the app I had too see the most disturbing image of all time. I tried to use it but it kept glitching like dude come on now. Anyhow today was a great day even tho it’s so hot..Alr bye now
